FuncDef: This command specifies that a J1-path-trace that identifies the circuit is inserted continuously at source. This can be checked against the expected value by the receiver. If no trace string is entered then a null string is used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies either a string up to 62 bytes for SONET or 15 bytes for SDH. If the string contains spaces, enclose it in quotation marks. String  zeros  will send all zeros in the J1 bytes.

ExtraInfo: Default: The default J1 value is Alcatel-Lucent XXX YYY where XXX is the platform number, such as "7750" or "7450", and YYY is the platform acronym, such as "SR" or "ESS". The value does not change when the encap-type changes. The J1 string contains all zeros for a non-provisioned path.
